Text:
Here is the latest WWE Monday Night Raw Supershow 2012-07-16 720p AVCHD-SC-SDH in 720p!!!

Please stay connected after your download is finished to help seed this show for people still downloading it and enjoy the show!!! :D
I have the CCCP Codec Package and use VLC. When I tried to play this video there was no picture only sound. Did anyone else have this problem?
I get only sound... -_- anyone else?

To ensure that you can get proper playback be sure you have installed the K-lite codec pack full version or mega version both of which comes with Media Player Classic Home Cinema and configure it properly for .mkv playback. If you do not have it you can get it here below: 

http://www.free-codecs.com/download/K_Lite_Codec_Pack.htm 

Once installed you can playback the .mkv file with the following players:

Media Player Classic, Power DVD, or Windows Media Player. 

VLC player doesnt play the video only the audio for some unknown reason, so use the above players or you can burn the .mkv video file to a DVD -R disc or load it onto a USB flash drive and play it back on any BluRay player that is MKV compatible and has a USB port like my Panasonic DMP BD75 BluRay player does.

VLC is the most popular open source video player. Why would you not make sure your encodes are enjoyable to the most people with the least amount of hassle?

Say what you will about the scene, but their encoding standards are to be praised when you see what everybody else is doing

FUCK VLC!!! Klite codec pack with Media Player Classic kicks VLC's candy ass because it will play EVERYTHING unlike VLC which is a finnicky piece of shit player. Oh and I have downloaded scene releases that VLC wouldn't play but Media Player classic does play first time every time.
